bill.title: Relating to behavioral health.
bill.description: Directs Oregon Health Authority to study ways to reduce time needed to transfer incarcerated defendants who lack fitness to proceed to Oregon State Hospital, and to provide results of study to interim committees of Legislative Assembly no later than December 31, 2024. Directs Oregon Health Authority to study ways to reduce time needed to transfer incarcerated defendants who lack fitness to proceed to Oregon State Hospital, and to provide results of study to interim committees of Legislative Assembly no later than December 31, 2024. Sunsets January 2, 2025.

history.action: First reading. Referred to Speaker's desk.
Referred to Behavioral Health and Health Care.
